assignments.name: Set_found_opp_equal_to_record_ID
assignments.label: Set found opp equal to recordId

choices.name: choice_prior_owner
choices.choiceText: Close under {!Get_prior_owner.FirstName} {!Get_prior_owner.LastName}'s name

choices.name: Moveaccountbacktothepool
choices.choiceText: Move account back to the pool

decisions.name: Chose_timing_reason
decisions.label: Chose timing and no reengagement plan

decisions.name: Is_committed_customer_or_ROE_hold
decisions.label: Is committed customer or ROE hold?

rules.name: Yes_0
rules.conditionLogic: 1 OR 2 OR 8 OR (3 AND 4) OR 5 OR (6 AND 7)
rules.label: Yes

decisions.name: Open_renewal_too_far_in_the_future
decisions.label: Is renewal too far in the future?

decisions.name: Within_close_in_prior_owner_s_name_window
decisions.label: Within close in prior owner's name window?

formulas.name: Opp_Age
formulas.expression: CASE({!Prior_stage}, "(0) Booking Meeting","", "(1) Qualification","*Days Since Qual Meeting*: "&TEXT({!recordId.Days_in_S1__c}), "*Days Since SQO:* "&TEXT({!recordId.Age_from_SQO__c}) )

formulas.name: Reengage_plan
formulas.expression: IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!Reengagement_date})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Reengagement_details})), "*Reengage on "&TEXT(MONTH({!Reengagement_date}))+"/" +TEXT(DAY({!Reengagement_date}))+"/" +TEXT(YEAR({!Reengagement_date}))&"*: "&{!Reengagement_details}, "*Reengage Plan*: None provided" )

fields.name: Do_not_post_Slack_notification
fields.fieldText: Do not post Slack notification

fields.name: admin_Screen_Close_Date
fields.fieldText: Close Date

screens.name: Close_opportunity_in_prior_owner_s_name
screens.label: Close opportunity in prior owner's name?

fields.name: change_owner_header
fields.fieldText: This opportunity was previously owned by {!Get_prior_owner.FirstName} {!Get_prior_owner.LastName} ({!Get_prior_owner.Role_Name__c}) and was transferred into your name less than {!Get_business_automation.Days_to_Close_in_Prior_Owner_s_Name__c} days ago.

fields.name: Would_you_like_to_close_this_opportunity_under_the_previous_owner_s_name
fields.fieldText: You have the option to close this opportunity under the previous owner's name. Would you like to:

screens.name: Closed_Lost_Move_back_to_Pool
screens.label: Closed Lost - Move back to Pool?

fields.name: move_to_pool_message
fields.fieldText: No additional open non-renewal opportunities were found on this account.

fields.name: Ownership_choice
fields.fieldText: Would you like to:

fields.name: ROE_Warning_retain
fields.fieldText: Important: You will be able to continue working this account until {!roe_back_to_pool_date}. If you have not booked a qualification meeting and created an opportunity by that date, the account will automatically be moved back to the Account Pool and you will not be able to reclaim it for {!$User.Account_Min_Time_Before_Reclaim_Days__c} days.

fields.name: ROE_warning_move
fields.fieldText: Important: If you move this account to the pool you will not be able to reclaim this account for {!$User.Account_Min_Time_Before_Reclaim_Days__c} days per ROE. If a prospect from this account books a meeting it will be routed to the then current owner or the next available AE in the round robin.

fields.name: Error_Screen_0
fields.fieldText: You cannot move this opportunity to Closed Lost because you are not the opportunity owner, a sales manager, or the rep qualifying the deal.

fields.name: Error_Screen_0_0
fields.fieldText:
This account does not have an employee count.


Before moving this opportunity to Closed Lost, please help us keep our CRM data clean by navigating to LinkedIn, looking up the number of employees, and inputting below:

fields.name: Num_emp
fields.fieldText: Number of employees from LinkedIn

validationRule.errorMessage: Please provide the number of employees

fields.name: Error_Screen_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
This renewal opportunity is not targeted to close until {!recordId.Renewal_Target_Close_Date__c}, which is {!recordId.Time_to_Renewal_days__c} days from today.


Are you sure you would like to churn this customer so far in advance of their renewal date?

fields.name: Error_Screen_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: You cannot move this opportunity to Closed Lost because it is a renewal set to automatically close. Please remove the opportunity from auto-close first.

fields.name: Error_Screen_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: You cannot move this opportunity to Closed Lost because it is already closed.

fields.name: Error_Screen_0_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
You cannot move this opportunity to Closed Lost because there is an open technical evaluation.


Please work the assigned Sales Engineer ({!recordId.Technical_Evaluation__r.Owner:User.FirstName} {!recordId.Technical_Evaluation__r.Owner:User.LastName}) to resolve this technical evaluation before proceeding.

fields.name: Error_Screen_0_0_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
You cannot move this opportunity to Closed Lost because closing has been blocked by Revenue Operations for the following reason:


{!recordId.Ops_Notes__c}

fields.name: Error_Screen_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: Error: Bad record type. Please contact Revenue Operations

fields.name: Valid_lost_reason
fields.fieldText: Please select a valid Closed Lost reason and alternative solution

fields.name: Valid_lost_reason_0
fields.fieldText:
If you select Timing as the Lost Reason, you are required to set a Rengagement Date and provide Reengagement details.


Please go back and populate these fields.

fields.name: Warning_expired_hold_time
fields.fieldText:
WARNING: You are eligible to own accounts for up to {!$User.Account_Max_Hold_Time_Days__c} days and you have owned this account for {!account_owned_days} days.


Once you close this opportunity, the account will be moved back to the Account Pool. You will not be able to reclaim it for {!$User.Account_Min_Time_Before_Reclaim_Days__c} days. During this time, the account may be claimed by or routed to another rep via round robin.


Are you sure you want to proceed?

fields.name: Lost_reason_header
fields.fieldText: Lost Reason

fields.name: Header
fields.fieldText: To move this opportunity to Closed Lost and remove it from your pipeline, please select why we lost the deal:

fields.name: Lost_reason
fields.fieldText: Lost reason:
fields.helpText: The primary reason why Retool lost this deal

fields.name: Lost_reason_details
fields.fieldText: Lost reason details:
fields.helpText: Additional context about why lost the deal

fields.name: Alternative_solution_ent
fields.fieldText: What is the prospect going to do instead of pursuing this deal?
fields.helpText: Select what this prospect will do to fill their need instead of buying a Retool Committed product or Retool services.

fields.name: screen_competition
fields.fieldText: Please select any known competitive solutions the prospect evaluated during the sales process:

fields.name: competitor_tip
fields.fieldText: Tip: Hold Command to select multiple options. Choose "Unknown" if you don't know.

fields.name: optional_reengagement_date
fields.fieldText: Reengagement Plan (Optional)

fields.name: required_reengagement_plan
fields.fieldText: Reengagement Plan (Required)

fields.name: Reengage_header
fields.fieldText: Set a date when it would make sense to attempt to reengage this account and provide any helpful context for you or the next rep. These details will be written to the account upon save:

fields.name: Reengagement_date
fields.fieldText: Reengagement date:

validationRule.errorMessage: The reengagement date must be in the future.

fields.name: Reengagement_details
fields.fieldText: Reengagement details:

fields.name: Header_0
fields.fieldText:
IMPORTANT: Closing this renewal will record a full churn and remove it from your pipeline. This action can only be undone by Revenue Operations.


Please select why this customer is not renewing:

fields.name: Churn_reason
fields.fieldText: Churn reasons (pick all that apply):

fields.name: Details_header_0
fields.fieldText: Provide some additional context:

fields.name: Churn_reason_details
fields.fieldText: Churn reason details:

fields.name: Alternative_solution_churn
fields.fieldText: What is this customer going to do instead of a committed Retool plan?

fields.name: renewal_competetitor
fields.fieldText: Please select any competitive solution(s) the customer will use instead of Retool:

fields.name: Reengage_header_0
fields.fieldText: Optionally, set a date when it would make sense to attempt to reengage this account and provide any helpful context for you or the next rep. These details will be written to the account upon save:

fields.name: Reengagement_date_0
fields.fieldText: Reengagement date:

validationRule.errorMessage: The reengagement date must be in the future.

fields.name: Reengagement_details_0
fields.fieldText: Reengagement details:

fields.name: screen_section_ai
fields.fieldText: Please help us understand how or if AI played a role in Retool losing this deal:

fields.name: screen_ai_disposition
fields.fieldText: How did AI contribute to this loss?

fields.name: screen_ai_details
fields.fieldText: Please provide any additional details about AI's role in this deal:

textTemplates.name: slack_post_churn
textTemplates.text:
:no_entry_sign: {!recordId.Name} churn recorded by {!$User.Slack_Mention_Handle_Only__c}* :no_entry_sign:


  • Account: {!recordId.Account.Name} ({!recordId.Account.Account_Status__c} | {!recordId.Account.Segment__c} | {!recordId.Account.NumberOfEmployees} employees | {!recordId.Account.Industry}) | {!recordId.Account.Customer_Success_Tier__c}
  • Commercial Owner: {!recordId.Account.Owner.Slack_Mention_With_Role_Full_Name__c}
  • Technical Account Manager: {!tam}
  • Customer Since: {!recordId.Account.Customer_Since__c}
  • Renewal Baseline ARR: ${!recordId.Renewal_Baseline_ARR__c}


  • Churn Reason(s): {!recordId.Churn_Reason__c}
  • Alternative Solution: {!recordId.Alternative_Solution__c}
  • Churn Reason Details: {!recordId.Churn_Reason_Details__c}
  • Role of AI: [{!recordId.AI_Disposition__c}] {!recordId.AI_Disposition_Details__c}

textTemplates.name: Slack_post_enterprise
textTemplates.text:
:no_entry_sign: {!recordId.Name} Closed Lost by {!$User.Slack_Mention_Handle_Only__c} :no_entry_sign:


Account: {!recordId.Account.Name} ({!recordId.Account.Account_Status__c} | {!recordId.Account.Segment__c} | {!recordId.Account.NumberOfEmployees} employees | {!recordId.Account.Industry})

Prior Stage: {!Prior_stage} for {!Prior_stage_duration} days

New ARR: ${!recordId.New_ARR__c}

Alternative Solution: {!recordId.Alternative_Solution__c}

Lost Reason: {!recordId.Lost_Reason__c}

Lost Reason Details: {!recordId.Lost_Reason_Details__c}

Role of AI: [{!recordId.AI_Disposition__c}] {!recordId.AI_Disposition_Details__c}

Competitors: {!recordId.Competition__c}

{!Opp_Age}

{!Reengage_plan}
